bool is_built
 

Detailed Description

An abstract class that defines the basic interface that the anncomponents must fulfill.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ANN::ANNComponent::build ( unsigned int  _input_size,
unsigned int  _output_size,
hash< string, Connections * > &  weights_dict,
hash< string, ANNComponent * > &  components_dict 
)
inlinevirtual

Abstract method to finish building of component hierarchy and set weights objects pointers. All childs which rewrite this method must call parent method before do anything.

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent, ANN::DotProductANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, ANN::BiasANNComponent, ANN::CopyANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

References april_utils::string::c_str(), ERROR_EXIT1, ERROR_EXIT2, input_size, is_built, name, and output_size.

Referenced by ANN::BiasANNComponent::build(), ANN::StackANNComponent::build(), ANN::CopyANNComponent::build(), ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent::build(), ANN::DotProductANNComponent::build(), ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent::build(), and ANN::JoinANNComponent::build().

virtual Token* ANN::ANNComponent::doBackprop ( Token *  input_error)
inlinevirtual

Virtual method that back-propagates error derivatives and computes other useful stuff. Receives input error gradients, and returns its output error gradients Token.

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::DotProductANNComponent, ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent, ANN::CopyANNComponent, ANN::BiasANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

virtual Token* ANN::ANNComponent::doForward ( Token *  input,
bool  during_training 
)
inlinevirtual

Virtual method that executes the set of operations required for each block of connections when performing the forward step of the Backpropagation algorithm, and returns its output Token

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::DotProductANNComponent, ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent, ANN::BiasANNComponent, ANN::CopyANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

virtual void ANN::ANNComponent::doUpdate ( )
inlinevirtual

Virtual method that update weights given gradients and input/output data

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::DotProductANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, ANN::BiasANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

virtual ANNComponent* ANN::ANNComponent::getComponent ( string &  name)
inlinevirtual

Virtual method which returns the component with the given name if exists, otherwise it returns 0. By default, base components only contains itself. Component composition will need to look to itself and all contained components. All childs which rewrite this method must call parent method before do anything.

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

Referenced by ANN::StackANNComponent::getComponent(), ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent::getComponent(), and ANN::JoinANNComponent::getComponent().

virtual double ANN::ANNComponent::getOption ( const char *  name)
inlinevirtual

Virtual method for getting the value of a training parameter. All childs which rewrite this method must call parent method after their process, if the looked option is not found to show the error message.

Reimplemented in ANN::JoinANNComponent, ANN::DotProductANNComponent, ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent, ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent, ANN::BiasANNComponent, and ANN::StackANNComponent.

bool ANN::ANNComponent::is_built
private

Referenced by build(), and getIsBuilt().

string ANN::ANNComponent::name
protected

The name identifies this component to do fast search. It is a unique name, repetitions are forbidden.

Referenced by ANNComponent(), ANN::ActivationFunctionANNComponent::build(), build(), ANN::SinActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::HardtanhActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::LinearActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::LogLogisticActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::LogSoftmaxActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::LogisticActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::SoftmaxActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::SoftplusActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::SoftsignActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::TanhActfANNComponent::clone(), ANN::StackANNComponent::clone(), ANN::BiasANNComponent::clone(), ANN::CopyANNComponent::clone(), ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent::clone(), ANN::DotProductANNComponent::clone(), ANN::JoinANNComponent::clone(), clone(), copyComponents(), debugInfo(), generateDefaultName(), and getName().
